text: Dan Waern (born 17 January 1933 in Sk√∂ldinge, Sweden) is a Swedish former middle-distance runner. In 1957, he became the first Swede to run the first sub-four-minute mile. 1957 was also the year he was awarded the Svenska Dagbladet Gold Medal. In 1961, the IAAF disqualified him for professionalism. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish middle-distance runners
title: Dan Waern
